[view] • [talk]

A ghost is an undead monster that is found on level 2 of the Abandoned Mine. After the players touching the haze, it become a ghost.

As they are undead, the salve amulet effects work well on them. While ghosts are not very effective combat training, they are a slayer task assigned by Jacquelyn and Vannaka and have a chance of dropping ghost hunter equipment and the ectoplasmator.
